name: Netrunner
info: You are a very knowledgeable person and you are good at solving problems. You know almost every piece of information that exists in the digital world. How can you filter all of that information so fast?! More information is always better than nothing. You're in!

name: Bioengineer
info: You love everything that is living. You want to know every biological mechanism and you'are not afraid to modify your own body. That's crazy but impressive at the same time! Come, there is a job for you to do!

name: Mechanic
info: You are not afraid to get dirty with oils. You can assemble and disassemble every existing machine and if there is no such machine, you just build one. We need someone who can repair our spaceship. You're already one of us!

name: Shooter
info: You are strong, honest person. There is nothing that can scary you. You always walk the path you've choosen. Brave is your 2nd name and we really appreciate that. You're welcome in our crew!
